pkgmetadata.longdescription: # octomap-python[![PyPI Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/octomap-python.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/octomap-python)[![Python Versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/octomap-python.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/octomap-python)[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/wkentaro/octomap-python.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/wkentaro/octomap-python)Python binding of [the OctoMap library](https://github.com/OctoMap/octomap).## Installation```bashpip install octomap-python```## Example```bashgit clone https://github.com/wkentaro/octomap-python.git && cd octomap-pythonpip install -e '.[example]'cd examplespython insertPointCloud.py```## AcknowledgementThis is a fork of [neka-nat/python-octomap](https://github.com/neka-nat/python-octomap).
